item.title: Secondpost
item.author: Celine
item.description: This is the second post. 在 double short codes 裡面寫 markdown 語法不管用， 如果要加 markdown 語法的話，要把 {{< >}} 改成 {{% %}} **Testing doubly short code.** Testing doubly short code. short code

item.title: Firstpost
item.author: Celine
item.description: Front matter - meta data about this piece of data key-value pairs that gives us information about this file can be written in three languages: yaml, toml, json default language for front matter is yaml What does a toml-style front matter look like? +++ title = "FirstPost" date = YYYY-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss draft = true +++ versus a yaml-style front matter --- title: "firstPost" date: YYYY-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss draft: true --- Create custom front matter such as
